00075   typedef std::pair<AirFrame*, int> ReceivedSignal;

00081   bool isChannelIdle;
00082 
00084   typedef struct tCSRInfo {
00085     ChannelSenseRequest* first;
00086     simtime_t            second;
00087     simtime_t            canAnswerAt;
00088 
00089     tCSRInfo()
00090       : first(NULL)
00091       , second()
00092       , canAnswerAt()
00093     {}
00094     tCSRInfo(const tCSRInfo& o)
00095       : first(o.first)
00096       , second(o.second)
00097       , canAnswerAt(o.canAnswerAt)
00098     {}
00099     tCSRInfo& operator=(const tCSRInfo& copy)
00100     {
00101       first       = copy.first;
00102       second      = copy.second;
00103       canAnswerAt = copy.canAnswerAt;
00104       return *this;
00105     }
00106     void swap(tCSRInfo& s)
00107     {
00108       std::swap(first,       s.first);
00109       std::swap(second,      s.second);
00110       std::swap(canAnswerAt, s.canAnswerAt);
00111     }
00112 
00113     ChannelSenseRequest* getRequest() const       { return first; }
00114     void setRequest(ChannelSenseRequest* request) { first = request; }
00115     simtime_t_cref getSenseStart() const          { return second; }
00116     void setSenseStart(simtime_t_cref start)      { second = start; }
00117     simtime_t_cref getAnswerTime() const          { return canAnswerAt; }
00118     void setAnswerTime(simtime_t_cref answerAt)   { canAnswerAt = answerAt; }
00119   } CSRInfo;
00120 
00123   CSRInfo currentChannelSenseRequest;
00124 
00127   int myIndex;
00128 
00130   bool debug;
00131 
00132 public:
00139   BaseDecider(DeciderToPhyInterface* phy, double sensitivity,
00140               int myIndex, bool debug)
00141     : Decider(phy)
00142     , sensitivity(sensitivity)
00143     , currentSignal()
00144     , isChannelIdle(true)
00145     , currentChannelSenseRequest()
00146     , myIndex(myIndex)
00147     , debug(debug)
00148   {
00149     currentSignal.first = 0;
00150     currentSignal.second = NEW;
00151     currentChannelSenseRequest.first = 0;
00152     currentChannelSenseRequest.second = -1;
00153     currentChannelSenseRequest.canAnswerAt = -1;
00154   }
